summary: USC is a top private research university in Los Angeles, California, founded in 1880. It's the oldest of its kind in the state and has over 49,000 students. The university has one liberal arts college and 22 other schools, attracting students from all over the USA and many countries. USC is known for its sports teams, the Trojans, who have won many NCAA championships and Olympic medals. It's also one of the best for football players going pro.
title: University of Southern California
